charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1101_0100_:
One morning, [Name:PlayerNickname ] found
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ] heading toward the sound of a commotion.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1101_0200_: There appeared to be a dispute between Trainers.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_0300_: What’s the problem? I’m asking you for a battle!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_0400_:
When Trainers’ eyes meet, they’ve got to have a
Pokémon battle! That’s just common sense!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1101_0500_:
An unsavory-looking sync pair seemed to be
challenging someone who wasn’t interested in
a battle.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_0700_:
That Trainer’s been going around challenging
anyone and everyone to battles, without any care
about how they feel.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_0900_:
That Trainer’s been going around challenging
anyone and everyone to battles, without any care
about how they feel.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1000_:
Huh? What’s your deal? You wanna have
a battle?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1100_:
Oh... I was hoping you’d have a Pokémon battle
with me...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1200_: What an incredibly cute Trainer you are.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1300_:
Wh-what?!
Where’d that come from all of a sudden?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1400_:
Those clothes look fabulous on you, too... I’m sure
you’d look great in some of the clothes I’ve made.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1500_:
Wh-what’s with you?
If you keep complimenting me so much...
there’s no way I won’t start to feel happy.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1600_:
Oh, your partner Pokémon appears embarrassed
as well. Hee hee, what a cute sync pair.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1700_:
Wha—?! How?! Why?! My adorable, little
Pokémon has totally lost the will to battle!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1800_:
For badness’ sake! I don’t even feel like battling
anymore. Ugh! I’m heading back to my place
for today.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_2100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Were you worried
about me? Thank you... I’m all right, though.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_2300_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Were you worried
about me? Thank you... I’m all right, though.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2400_:
My Pokémon may appear frail as the breeze and
delicate as a bloom, but looks can be deceiving.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2500_:
Sylveon was emitting an aura from his feelers
without that Trainer noticing.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2600_:
Sylveon’s aura can calm aggressive feelings.
Pretty smart, right?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2700_:
I’m more than just an ordinary Trainer, you know...
I’m actually...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_3000_: A Gym Leader? I am, but not here on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_3200_: I’m not working as a designer on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_3400_:
Oh, sorry. I got lost in thought and forgot what
we were talking about for a moment.
Oh, that’s right.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_3500_:
I’m pretty carefree, so Sylveon and I are quite
similar. We’re a good match, I think.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0301_3600_: You’re a sync pair that looks alike!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_3700_:
I’m very happy to hear you say that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_3900_:
I’m very happy to hear you say that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_4000_:
I’ve always wanted to be a Pokémon, and that’s
reflected in the clothes I design.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_4100_:
I wonder... Does that mean I’d be able to drain an
opponent of their will to fight, like Sylveon does?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_4300_: What do you think? Does it have any effect?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_4500_:
Thank goodness. Next, I think I’ll try it out in a
Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_4700_:
That’s a shame. But I won’t give up trying to
become a Pokémon.
